humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there are metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (N1). Specifically, one sentinel lymph node had a 9 mm metastasis (specimen A) and another sentinel lymph node had a micrometastasis (specimen B). Therefore, the N stage is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has 1 sentinel lymph node with macrometastasis (9 mm) and 1 sentinel lymph node with micrometastasis (1 mm), which falls under N1 according to the TNM staging system. The additional axillary tissue lymph node was negative for tumor.
